name: Reada's Quest
description:
Reada has a nightmare that Athens is in danger. Collect items with her so that the oracle can see Reada's vision!

Further reading:

Athena the Brain by Joan, Holub

Where is the Parthenon? by Roberta Edwards

The Ancient City Life in Classical Athens and Rome by Peter Connolly

Young Zeus by Brian G. Karas

Poseidon and the Sea of Fury by Joan Holub

Created by Michele Ritter rittermi.itch.io
